title: Pear Blossom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Chinese, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pear Orchard Temple in Shaxi is an old folk temple that has been restored and continues to serve as a community and religious centre for locals. Houses a vegetarian-friendly restaurant where visitors and locals alike can experience field-to-table cuisine. Known for its Shaxi pizza "buddha's hand", due to its irregular shaped crust. Food is prepared by local village women who specialize in Shaxi Yunnan cooking and were trained in Shaxi pizza by a French cook. Can accommodate large groups.
